content: **a blend of the trending curved hemline boat-neck t-shirt silhouette and traditional fisherman gansey motifs a summer gansey ** although originally published as a recipe of sorts for how i knit the top in my size instructions are now available for 6 sizes 34 35 5 37 39 41 42 5 i am still trying to figure out how to size the pattern up to 60 because of the necessary additional raglan increases required for the larger sizes i had to add a pattern repeat to sizes 37 39 41 and 42 5 i chose an andalusian stitch motif not pictured in the sample because it is not needed for size 34 *and as always if you you knit the sweater and would like to give back please consider making a small donation to your local food bank or women s shelter thank you *
